game.name: Mini Car Money Chase
game.shortDescription: 미니 자동차 돈 체이스는 돈을 수집하고 자동차를 개선하여 경찰에서 탈출해야 끝없는 경주입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Race for big money while running away from the police. In this miniature arcade game, you have to participate in an endless race for money.

reviewHighlights.text: Fun simple 1980's Atari type of game. Very simple yet very fun. A nice little indie game. A good time waster. Nothing major, nothing special just old...
Nice game, with good graphics and gameplay. It's simple and fun to play, it's also quite relaxing (until you have cops showing up from everywhere that...
